name: The Race (itch) (NervGEAR)
description:
Game Introduction

This game was developed for Alt. Game Development for the EAE Program (Entertainment Arts and Engineering) at the University of Utah.

Credit

Producer, Designer, Project Manager: Luojie Zhao

Artist: Xuanhao Mei, Bo Zhang, Yulong Han

Program: Jiayu Luo, Hao Xu

Game Screen

1920*1080

Background

The poor and the rich compete against each other and finally discover the harsh reality. Progress means success in life. 

The success of the poor is to struggle in the city.

The rich succeed by standing on top of the financial building.

Purport

In the real world, the rich have more advantages than the poor who can lead when born because of their family environments. The rich can reach the destination easily.

Art Style

Pixel

Playing Method

The Player will choose the old or the rich who will be operated whole race. Each character will pick up different items which have negative or positive effects to help the character reach the destination.
